title: Ticket #3489: Output Stderr to the Held message in the gridmanager
description: When the blahp grid manager starts, it can often fail for many reasons. The Hold message is never useful in this case. The grid manager should append the hold message with the last few lines of stderr from the blahp.
remarks:
2013-Apr-09 10:37:59 by dweitzel:
I'm not sure if there needs to be documentation for this feature. If not, I believe this ticket can be resolved.

2013-May-07 14:44:08 by jfrey:
I don't believe this ticket merits a mention in the version history.
